meanings.definition: Reversed in position, direction, or order.
meanings.sent1: The inverted picture showed the house at the bottom instead of the top.
meanings.sent2: The inverted map made it challenging to find our way around the city.
meanings.sent3: The inverted cake recipe called for frosting first and batter last!
meanings.sent4: Her world felt inverted, like walking on the ceiling instead of the floor.
meanings.sent5: The inverted umbrella design kept the rain off her back perfectly.

meanings.definition: Converted into the opposite or contrary.
